biotools.summary: Tools for the analysis of enrichment-based epigenomic data. Features include summarization and visualization of epigenomic data across promoters according to gene expression context, finding regions of differential methylation/binding, BayMeth for quantifying methylation etc.

bioschemas.name: Repitools
bioschemas.summary: Tools for the analysis of enrichment-based epigenomic data. Features include summarization and visualization of epigenomic data across promoters according to gene expression context, finding regions of differential methylation/binding, BayMeth for quantifying methylation etc.
